title: Sex - Sex-Ploytation - How Women Use Their Bodies to Extort Mone
description:
Sex-Ploytation - How Women Use Their Bodies to Extort Money from Men - By Matthew Fitzgerald.pdf

Not only is this book skillfully written, it hits America's dirty secret with lethal accuracy.  Although at times, I have felt that Mr. Fitzgerald treats human mating rituals like those between animals, but for the most part, I completely agreed with his position.  The fallacious principles behind the now perverted "Feminist Movement" have been finally revealed to the public.  In a way, the insight of this book is depressing, because it abolishes all our fantasies of "love" and "holy matrimony" and "eternal bliss".  But in the long run, I would rather be rid of such childish dillusions than pay dearly for them in a divorce. They say that no one should identify a problem without providing a solution, and Mr. Fitzgerald provides one.

Every American should read this. It is a true shame that such a legendary masterpiece is no longer published and mostly forgotten. If anything is capable of ending the Gender Wars, it would be this book.

File Under:
MGTOW, Men's Rights,mens rights, MRA, FRA, anti-feminism, feminism, mra, fra, Father's Rights, fathers rights, misandry, anti-misandry
